name: GeoloPy
short_description: A Python library to geolocate IP addresses. The library provides developers with a powerful interface to map IPv4 addresses to countries and cities. The maintenance of the IPs' database is completely transparent and effortless to the client.
summary: A Python library to geolocate IP addresses.
